TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 擷取並提出關於 Web 要求的執行詳細資料。

span.span: Captures and presents execution details about a Web request.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個類別來將訊息附加到特定的追蹤分類。You can use this class to append messages to specific trace categories. 例如，如果您要建立的執行個體類別為您的應用程式中，您想要加入追蹤訊息 「 正在啟動以轉譯 」 的轉譯程序和 「 引發 OnChange 事件 」 事件處理常式的程序中。For example, if you are creating an instance of the class for your application, you might include the trace message "Starting To Render" in a rendering procedure, and "Raising OnChange Event" in an event handler procedure. 您也可以使用類別來取得一組結尾的自訂處理的要求執行的追蹤記錄。You can also use the class to obtain a set of trace records at the end of request execution for custom processing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). 若要啟用追蹤，請設定`Trace`屬性中[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞或屬性設`true`。To enable tracing, set the `Trace` attribute in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or the property to `true`. 當啟用追蹤時，除了顯示使用者所提供的追蹤內容類別，會自動包含的效能資料、 控制樹狀結構的資訊和每個要求的狀態管理內容。When tracing is enabled, in addition to showing user-provided trace content, the class automatically includes performance data, control-tree structure information, and state management content for every request.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否已針對目前的 Web 要求啟用追蹤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the current Web request.

value.span: 如果已啟用追蹤，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if tracing is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個旗標，檢查是否網頁或應用程式應輸出追蹤資訊寫入追蹤記錄檔的任何項目之前。Use this flag to check whether your page or application should output tracing information before it writes anything to the trace log. 值屬性的子區段中的設定而定`system.web`組態區段，而`trace`指示詞的屬性。The value of the property depends on the settings in the subsection of the `system.web` configuration section and the value of the `trace` attribute of the directive. 在頁面指示詞中設定的追蹤選項的優先順序高於組態檔中設定的選項。The tracing option set in the page directive takes precedence over the option set in the configuration file. 設定值以程式設計方式的優先順序高於頁面指示詞屬性和組態設定。Setting the value programmatically takes precedence over both the page directive attribute and the configuration setting. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性，以`true`整個應用程式，您必須明確設定此屬性為`false`不想顯示的追蹤資訊的應用程式中的任何頁面。If you set the property to `true` for an entire application, you must explicitly set this property to `false` for any page in the application for which you do not want tracing information displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷頁面是否已啟用追蹤。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether tracing is enabled for a page. 程式碼會逐一查看資料集，該資料集中撰寫追蹤陳述式，每個資料列中的資料列。The code iterates through the rows in a dataset, writing trace statements for each row in that dataset. [!code-csharp[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Custom Event TraceFinished As TraceContextEventHandler

member this.TraceFinished : System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler

summary.span: 由 物件所引發，在收集所有要求資訊之後公開追蹤訊息。

span.span: Raised by the object to expose trace messages after all request information is gathered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間引發事件`EndRequest`HTTP 要求處理階段。The event is raised during the `EndRequest` stage of HTTP request processing. 它會引發物件之後已收集的所有要求的資訊，並公開 （expose） 的集合訊息，以註冊委派。It is raised by a object after all request information is gathered, to expose the collection of messages to registered delegates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何註冊處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a to handle the event. 在此範例中，委派會逐一查看的追蹤訊息並將其寫入至回應資料流中;不過，您可以撰寫的相同資訊的資料庫或程式碼剖析工具取用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them to the response stream; however, you could write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定已排序的順序，追蹤訊息依此順序輸出至提出要求的瀏覽器。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorted order in which trace messages should be output to a requesting browser.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 預設值為組態檔的 區段中 屬性所指定的設定 (此組態檔的預設值為 )。

span.span: The default is the setting specified by the attribute in the section of a configuration file, whose default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已處理的順序或依字母順序是由使用者定義的分類，可以進行排序追蹤訊息。Trace messages can be sorted in the order they were processed, or alphabetically by user-defined category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何您可以頁面的追蹤陳述式依字母順序排序的分類，您已指派的陳述式。The following code example demonstrates how you can sort a page's trace statements alphabetically by the categories that you have assigned to the statements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入檢測檔。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log.

summary.span: 不像 ，所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: Unlike , all warnings appear in the log as red text.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入檢測檔。

span.span: Writes a trace message to the trace log.

summary.span: 所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，也就是可存取，當您處理事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 隨即加入訊息，且其屬性設定為`true`並將其屬性設定為`null`。The message is added with its property set to `true` and its property set to `null`.

summary.span: 將追蹤資訊寫入追蹤記錄檔，包括任何使用者定義的分類、追蹤訊息和錯誤資訊。

summary.span: 所有警告在記錄檔中顯示為紅色文字。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，也就是可存取，當您處理事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 加上訊息及其屬性設定為`true`，而屬性設定為所傳遞的物件`errorInfo`參數。The message is added with its property set to `true`, and the property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，將錯誤追蹤訊息寫入追蹤記錄檔。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此範例中，不同的例外狀況會視為錯誤和警告追蹤。In this example, different exceptions are traced as errors and warnings. 頁面會擲回，它會寫入警告訊息，使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes a warning message using the method. 頁面會擲回，它會寫入錯誤訊息使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes an error message using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫方法時，追蹤訊息加入至訊息集合，也就是可存取，當您處理事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 隨即加入訊息，且其屬性設定為`false`並將其屬性設定為`null`。The message is added with its property set to `false` and its property set to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，將錯誤追蹤訊息寫入追蹤記錄檔。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此範例中，委派會逐一查看的追蹤訊息並將其寫入作為一個 HTML 資料表;不過，您可以撰寫的相同資訊的資料庫或程式碼剖析工具取用者。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them as an HTML table; however, you can write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer.
